title: Unplayable, Very Low Fps
body:
So, I been playing League a while since now, and basically today My client updated to patch 6.23, but after that the client became buggy and laggy and my FPS in game dropped from 60-80 to 10-20, which is really hard to play with. I tried repairing and the help with low FPS from riot games, but it doesn't matter, even if I have it in very low or very high it will be still 10 FPS. 

Anyone Could Help me?
Thank you
Sincerely Bulcsu

replies.body:
install the newest geforce driver now and see if that was the problem. I am assuming that is my problem. link below talks about how fps was cut in half for some users with last update.
https://www.techpowerup.com/227881/users-report-multiple-issues-with-geforce-375-86-whql-drivers

Just to be sure I'm not offering steps you've already tried, can you let me know which support article you've tried? Was it the [FPS Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)?
